where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF (QUERY (elp_fbnds <* QUERY (bnds <* bounds| ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.EDGE_LOOP' IN TYPEOF (bnds.bound)))| NOT (SIZEOF (QUERY (oe <* elp_fbnds.bound\path.edge_list| NOT ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.EDGE_CURVE' IN TYPEOF (oe\oriented_edge.edge_element)))) = 0))) = 0

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF (QUERY (elp_fbnds <* QUERY (bnds <* bounds| ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.EDGE_LOOP' IN TYPEOF (bnds.bound)))| NOT (SIZEOF (QUERY (oe <* elp_fbnds.bound\path.edge_list| NOT (SIZEOF ([ 'PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.LINE', 'PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.CONIC', 'PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.POLYLINE', 'PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.SURFACE_CURVE', 'PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.B_SPLINE_CURVE' ] * TYPEOF (oe.edge_element\edge_curve.edge_geometry)) = 1))) = 0))) = 0

where.label: WR4
where.expression: SIZEOF (QUERY (elp_fbnds <* QUERY (bnds <* bounds| ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.EDGE_LOOP' IN TYPEOF (bnds.bound)))| NOT (SIZEOF (QUERY (oe <* elp_fbnds.bound\path.edge_list| NOT ((('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.VERTEX_POINT' IN TYPEOF (oe\edge.edge_start)) AND ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.CARTESIAN_POINT' IN TYPEOF (oe\edge.edge_start\vertex_point.vertex_geometry))) AND (('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.VERTEX_POINT' IN TYPEOF (oe\edge.edge_end)) AND ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.CARTESIAN_POINT' IN TYPEOF (oe\edge.edge_end\vertex_point.vertex_geometry)))))) = 0))) = 0

where.label: WR5
where.expression: SIZEOF (QUERY (elp_fbnds <* QUERY (bnds <* bounds| ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.EDGE_LOOP' IN TYPEOF (bnds.bound)))| ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.ORIENTED_PATH' IN TYPEOF (elp_fbnds.bound)))) = 0

where.label: WR7
where.expression: SIZEOF (QUERY (vlp_fbnds <* QUERY (bnds <* bounds| ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.VERTEX_LOOP' IN TYPEOF (bnds.bound)))| NOT (('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.VERTEX_POINT' IN TYPEOF (vlp_fbnds\face_bound.bound\vertex_loop.loop_vertex)) AND ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.CARTESIAN_POINT' IN TYPEOF (vlp_fbnds\face_bound.bound\vertex_loop.loop_vertex\vertex_point.vertex_geometry))))) = 0

where.label: WR9
where.expression: SIZEOF (QUERY (elp_fbnds <* QUERY (bnds <* bounds| ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.EDGE_LOOP' IN TYPEOF (bnds.bound)))| NOT (SIZEOF (QUERY (oe <* elp_fbnds.bound\path.edge_list| ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.SURFACE_CURVE' IN TYPEOF (oe\oriented_edge.edge_element\edge_curve.edge_geometry)) AND NOT (SIZEOF (QUERY (sc_ag <* oe.edge_element\edge_curve.edge_geometry\surface_curve.associated_geometry| NOT ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.PCURVE' IN TYPEOF (sc_ag)))) = 0))) = 0))) = 0

where.label: WR10
where.expression: (NOT ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.SWEPT_SURFACE' IN TYPEOF (face_geometry)) OR (NOT ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.POLYLINE' IN TYPEOF (face_geometry\swept_surface.swept_curve)) OR (SIZEOF (face_geometry\swept_surface.swept_curve\polyline.points) >= 3))) AND (SIZEOF (QUERY (elp_fbnds <* QUERY (bnds <* bounds| ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.EDGE_LOOP' IN TYPEOF (bnds.bound)))| NOT (SIZEOF (QUERY (oe <* elp_fbnds.bound\path.edge_list| ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.POLYLINE' IN TYPEOF (oe\oriented_edge.edge_element\edge_curve.edge_geometry)) AND NOT (SIZEOF (oe\oriented_edge.edge_element\edge_curve.edge_geometry\polyline.points) >= 3))) = 0))) = 0)

where.label: WR1
where.expression: ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.UNIFORM_CURVE' IN TYPEOF(self)) OR('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.QUASI_UNIFORM_CURVE' IN TYPEOF(self)) OR('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.BEZIER_CURVE' IN TYPEOF(self)) OR('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.B_SPLINE_CURVE_WITH_KNOTS' IN TYPEOF(self))

entity.name: b_spline_surface
entity.super.expression: (ONEOF ( B_SPLINE_SURFACE_WITH_KNOTS, UNIFORM_SURFACE, QUASI_UNIFORM_SURFACE, BEZIER_SURFACE) ANDOR RATIONAL_B_SPLINE_SURFACE)

where.label: WR1
where.expression: ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.UNIFORM_SURFACE' IN TYPEOF(SELF)) OR('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.QUASI_UNIFORM_SURFACE' IN TYPEOF(SELF)) OR('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.BEZIER_SURFACE' IN TYPEOF(SELF)) OR('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.B_SPLINE_SURFACE_WITH_KNOTS' IN TYPEOF(SELF))

entity.name: binary_numeric_expression
entity.super.expression: (ONEOF ( MINUS_EXPRESSION, DIV_EXPRESSION, MOD_EXPRESSION, SLASH_EXPRESSION, POWER_EXPRESSION, BINARY_FUNCTION_CALL))

entity.name: boolean_expression
entity.super.expression: (ONEOF ( SIMPLE_BOOLEAN_EXPRESSION, UNARY_BOOLEAN_EXPRESSION, BINARY_BOOLEAN_EXPRESSION, MULTIPLE_ARITY_BOOLEAN_EXPRESSION, COMPARISON_EXPRESSION, INTERVAL_EXPRESSION, BOOLEAN_DEFINED_FUNCTION))

entity.name: comparison_expression
entity.super.expression: (ONEOF ( COMPARISON_EQUAL, COMPARISON_GREATER, COMPARISON_GREATER_EQUAL, COMPARISON_LESS, COMPARISON_LESS_EQUAL, COMPARISON_NOT_EQUAL, LIKE_EXPRESSION))

where.label: WR1
where.expression: (('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.NUMERIC_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(SELF\binary_generic_expression.operands[1])) AND('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.NUMERIC_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(SELF\binary_generic_expression.operands[2]))) OR(('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.BOOLEAN_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(SELF\binary_generic_expression.operands[1])) AND('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.BOOLEAN_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(SELF\binary_generic_expression.operands[2]))) OR(('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.STRING_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(SELF\binary_generic_expression.operands[1])) AND('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.STRING_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(SELF\binary_generic_expression.operands[2])))

where.label: WR1

where.label: WR6

function.name: is_int_expr
is_SQL_mappable
function.algorithm: LOCAL i: INTEGER; END_LOCAL; IF 'PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.SIMPLE_NUMERIC_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF (arg) THEN RETURN (TRUE); END_IF; IF 'PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.SQL_MAPPABLE_DEFINED_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF (arg) THEN RETURN (TRUE); END_IF; IF 'PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.MINUS_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg) THEN RETURN (is_SQL_mappable(arg\unary_numeric_expression.operand)); END_IF; IF ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.ABS_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.SIN_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.COS_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.TAN_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.ASIN_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.ACOS_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.ATAN_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.EXP_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.LOG_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.LOG2_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.LOG10_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.SQUARE_ROOT_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.VALUE_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.LENGTH_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) THEN RETURN (FALSE); END_IF; IF ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.PLUS_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.MULT_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.MAXIMUM_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.MINIMUM_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) THEN REPEAT i :=1 TO SIZEOF ( arg\multiple_arity_numeric_expression.operands); IF NOT is_SQL_mappable( arg\multiple_arity_numeric_expression.operands[i]) THEN RETURN (FALSE); END_IF; END_REPEAT; RETURN (TRUE); END_IF; IF ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.MINUS_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.SLASH_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) THEN RETURN (is_SQL_mappable( arg\binary_numeric_expression.operands[1]) AND is_SQL_mappable(arg\binary_numeric_expression.operands[2])); END_IF; IF ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.DIV_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.MOD_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.POWER_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) THEN RETURN (FALSE); END_IF; IF 'PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.SIMPLE_BOOLEAN_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF (arg) THEN RETURN (TRUE); END_IF; IF 'PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.NOT_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF (arg) THEN RETURN (is_SQL_mappable (arg\UNARY_GENERIC_EXPRESSION.OPERAND)); END_IF; IF ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.ODD_FUNCTION'IN TYPEOF (arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.XOR_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF (arg)) THEN RETURN (FALSE); END_IF; IF ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.AND_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF (arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.OR_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF (arg)) THEN REPEAT i:=1 TO SIZEOF ( arg\MULTIPLE_ARITY_BOOLEAN_EXPRESSION.OPERANDS); IF NOT is_SQL_mappable ( arg\MULTIPLE_ARITY_BOOLEAN_EXPRESSION.OPERANDS[i]) THEN RETURN (FALSE); END_IF; END_REPEAT; RETURN (TRUE); END_IF; IF 'PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.EQUALS_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF (arg) THEN RETURN(is_SQL_mappable ( arg\BINARY_GENERIC_EXPRESSION.OPERANDS [1]) AND is_SQL_mappable( arg\BINARY_GENERIC_EXPRESSION.OPERANDS [2])); END_IF; IF ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.COMPARISON_EQUAL' IN TYPEOF (arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.COMPARISON_GREATER' IN TYPEOF (arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.COMPARISON_GREATER_EQUAL' IN TYPEOF (arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.COMPARISON_LESS' IN TYPEOF (arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.COMPARISON_LESS_EQUAL' IN TYPEOF (arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.COMPARISON_NOT_EQUAL' IN TYPEOF (arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.LIKE_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF (arg)) THEN RETURN (is_SQL_mappable (arg\COMPARISON_EXPRESSION.OPERANDS[1]) AND is_SQL_mappable (arg\COMPARISON_EXPRESSION.OPERANDS[2])); END_IF; IF 'PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.INTERVAL_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(arg) THEN RETURN (is_SQL_mappable(arg\interval_expression.interval_low) AND is_SQL_mappable(arg\interval_expression.interval_high) AND is_SQL_mappable(arg\interval_expression.interval_item)); END_IF; IF ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.NUMERIC_DEFINED_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.BOOLEAN_DEFINED_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.STRING_DEFINED_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) THEN RETURN (FALSE) ; END_IF; IF 'PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.SIMPLE_STRING_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(ARG) THEN RETURN (TRUE); END_IF; IF ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.INDEX_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.SUBSTRING_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.CONCAT_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF.FORMAT_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) THEN RETURN (FALSE); END_IF; RETURN (FALSE);

where.expression: SIZEOF (QUERY (r <* document_format_representations |(SIZEOF (QUERY (i <* r.items | (i.name = 'character code') AND('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF' + '.DESCRIPTIVE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' IN TYPEOF (i)))) >1))) =0

where.label: WR4
where.expression: SIZEOF (QUERY (r <* document_format_representations |(SIZEOF (QUERY (i <* r.items | (i.name = 'data format') AND('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF' + '.DESCRIPTIVE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' IN TYPEOF (i)))) >1))) =0

where.label: WR5
where.expression: SIZEOF (QUERY (r <* document_format_representations |(SIZEOF (QUERY (i <* r.items| (i.name = 'size format') AND('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF' + '.PLANAR_EXTENT' IN TYPEOF (i)))) >1))) = 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF (QUERY (pd <* property_definition |(pd. name ='document property') AND(SIZEOF (QUERY (pdr <* USEDIN(pd ,'PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF' + '.PROPERTY_DEFINITION_REPRESENTATION.DEFINITION') | NOT (pdr.used_representation.name IN ['document content' , 'document creation' ,'document format' , 'document size' ]))) >0))) =0

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF (QUERY (r <* representation |(r.name IN [ 'document content' , 'document creation' , 'document format' , 'document size' ]) AND(SIZEOF (QUERY (pdr <* USEDIN (r ,'PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF' + '.PROPERTY_DEFINITION_REPRESENTATION.USED_REPRESENTATION') |('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF' + '.PROPERTY_DEFINITION' IN TYPEOF(pdr. definition)) AND(pdr. definition.name = 'document property'))) =0))) =0

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF (QUERY (r <* representation |(r.name IN ['document content' , 'document creation' , 'document format' , 'document size' ]) AND(r.context_of_items.context_type<> 'document parameters'))) =0

where.label: WR4
where.expression: SIZEOF (QUERY (rc <* representation_context |(rc.context_type = 'document parameters') AND(SIZEOF (QUERY(r <* USEDIN (rc ,'PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF' + '.REPRESENTATION.CONTEXT_OF_ITEMS') | NOT(r.name IN [ 'document content' , 'document creation' ,'document format' , 'document size' ]))) >0))) =0

rule.name: restrict_representation_for_document_size_property

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF (QUERY (ri <* representation_item | (SIZEOF (QUERY (r <* USEDIN (ri ,'PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF' + '.REPRESENTATION.ITEMS') | r.name ='document size')) >0) AND NOT (ri. name IN ['file size' , 'page count' ]))) =0

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF (QUERY (r <* document_size_representations|(SIZEOF (QUERY (i <* r.items | (i.name = 'file size') AND(SIZEOF (['PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF' + '.MEASURE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' ,'PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF' + '.VALUE_RANGE' ,'PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_MIM_LF' + '.VALUE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM']* TYPEOF (i)) =1))) >1))) =0

where.label: WR4
